stories.text:
Hi, I've built an appointment scheduling web application (https://schedulo.hsen.tech/). The application has features to automatically create appointment time slots when the slot length and duration of a slot are provided. It also allows manual slot creation. I'm hoping to add more features down the line. This is currently in beta, so any feedback is appreciated. Thanks!

~ hasithsen
stories.title: Schedulo (Appointment Scheduler)

Show HN: Docker Compose compatible dev env manager

stories.text:
My Mac Air is close to giving up the ghost and I'm currently evaluating an M1 (16GB, 1TB) but somehow Apple's recent moves is causing disquiet and am considering returning it (even though it's actually not a bad machine).

So I need your advice on a developer's laptop capable of running some flavor of Linux for under 2k. Back in the day the choice would have been simple: ThinkPad but there are all sorts of negative reviews regarding quality of Lenovo and I've been buying Macs for decades so I'm fairly clueless regarding alternatives. Many thanks.
stories.title: Ask HN: Need advice on best Linux compatible laptop under 2K
